articles.title: Message to Kim Jong Un from Russian Political Party Leader
articles.content:
Message to Kim Jong Un from Russian Political Party Leader
						
 Pyongyang, July 16 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, received a message from S. M. Mironov, chairman of A Just Russia.
					 The message said:
					
					 I express deep consolation to you on behalf of A Just Russia and on my own behalf on the occasion of the 20th anniversary of demise of Comrade Kim Il Sung, the great leader of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
					
					 Comrade Kim Il Sung was the outstanding leader of the Korean people and organizer and encourager of all their successes and victories.
					
					 The friendly and cooperative relations were established between the Workers' Party of Korea founded under his personal leadership and A Just Russia.
					
					 I express belief that the historically close relations between Russia and the DPRK which were established on the basis of the mutual respect and solidarity of the people of our two great countries would grow strong in the future, too to ensure peace and security on the Korean peninsula and in Northeast Asia.

articles.title: Special Envoy of Mongolian President Leaves for Home
articles.content:
Special Envoy of Mongolian President Leaves for Home
 Pyongyang, July 16 (KCNA) -- Special envoy of the Mongolian president Khaltmaa Battulga, member of the State Great Hural, and his party left here for home on Wednesday.

articles.title: Special Envoy of Mongolian President Tours West Sea Barrage
articles.content:
Special Envoy of Mongolian President Tours West Sea Barrage
						
 Pyongyang, July 16 (KCNA) -- Khaltmaa Battulga, member of the State Great Hural, who was visiting the DPRK as a special envoy of the Mongolian president, toured the West Sea Barrage on Wednesday.
					 He enjoyed the bird's-eye view of the barrage and watched the video on which the construction process of the barrage is recorded.
					
					 He went round Nampho Port.

articles.title: Floral Basket, Congratulatory Letter to Kim Jong Un from Military Attaches Corps Here
articles.content:
Floral Basket, Congratulatory Letter to Kim Jong Un from Military Attaches Corps Here
						
 Pyongyang, July 16 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un received a floral basket and congratulatory letter from the military attaches corps here on the occasion of the 2nd anniversary of the title of Marshal of the DPRK awarded to him. 
					 The floral basket and congratulatory letter were handed to General of the Korean People's Army Hyon Yong Chol, minister of the People's Armed Forces, on Wednesday by doyen of the corps Hassan Reza Husseini, military attache of the Iranian embassy here.

articles.title: Kosanjin Revolutionary Site Draws Endless Stream of Visitors
articles.content:
Kosanjin Revolutionary Site Draws Endless Stream of Visitors
						
 Manpho, July 16 (KCNA) -- A large number of people visit the Kosanjin Revolutionary Site in Manpho City, Jagang Province every day these days on the occasion of day of war victory.
					 More than six million visitors including service personnel, people from all walks of life and school youth and children visited the revolutionary site for more than five decades after it was built in Juche 47(1958).
					
					 The Kosanjin Revolutionary Site is associated with the undying feats President Kim Il Sung performed in planning the final victory in the Fatherland Liberation War, wisely commanding a new counterattack operation and providing a turning phase of the war while staying in Kosanjin from early November to mid December in 1950.
					
					 There are the Rimsonggol Commanding Post of the Supreme Command, Spring Site, Thrashing Site, Sungribong Anti-aircraft Machine Gun Platform, Shooting Range, Somungori Commanding Post of the Supreme Command, Operation Bureau of the Supreme Command, Anti-aircraft Combat Site, etc.
					
					 And there are also several relics in Kujolgol, Oryugol and Pyolo revolutionary sites.
					
					 The visitors looked back again on the far-sighted wisdom and matchless pluck of the President and his tireless efforts for the victory in the war.

articles.title: DPRK Benefits from Agro-Forestry Management
articles.content:
DPRK Benefits from Agro-Forestry Management
 Pyongyang, July 16 (KCNA) -- Various units in the DPRK are now gaining profits in forestation and agricultural production through introduction of the agro-forestry management method.
					 This year Songchon County, South Phyongan Province, has introduced the method in forest area of 100 more hectares than last year.
					
					 The county planted and cultivated black alder, Aronia melanocarpa, walnut, chestnut and other trees together with maize, beans, sweet potato, groundnut and other crops in the area of several hundred hectares last year alone. As a result, those trees' rate of rooting was more than 98 percent and the speed of their growth 1.7 times as compared with the previous year while hundreds of tons of crops were harvested.
					
					 Kujang County, North Phyongan Province, has ensured the rate of rooting at 100 percent through the agro-forestry management.
					
					 Last year, it planted 126 000 trees of economic value in mountains of 600 hectares while cultivating various crops there to increase the fertility of soil.
					
					 Teachers and researchers of the Kanggye University of Agriculture and Forestry succeeded in creating meadow through agro-forestry management for 7-8 years. The feed grass' rate of rooting there is 100 percent and its yield more than 2 times higher.

articles.title: More Spots for Natural Medical Treatment Discovered in DPRK
articles.content:
More Spots for Natural Medical Treatment Discovered in DPRK
						
 Pyongyang, July 16 (KCNA) -- Researchers at the Medical Science Information Technology Institute of the Academy of Medical Science traveled various parts of the country recently to discover hot springs, mineral water, mud and mountain streams in more than 190 spots.
					 They first made an analysis of the water of the springs near the old home of President Kim Il Sung in Mangyongdae and on Mangyong Hill in Pyongyang and then made analysis of samples of dozens of sources of mud for medical treatment, more than a hundred hydrotherapeutic sources and climate treatment sources, streams in hundreds of mountains and sources of landscape medical treatment while covering more than 12 000 km for years.
					
					 In this period they discovered sources of mineral water in 47 sites, the source of mud in one site and sources of mountain streams for medical treatment in 146 places while making a physical and chemical analysis of the existing sources again.
					
					 Researchers and medical workers authored and complied the five- volume book "Book on Korean Natural Treatment Sources ".
					
					 Supreme leader Kim Jong Un highly praised them.

articles.title: Swimming Encouraged in DPRK
articles.content:
Swimming Encouraged in DPRK
 Pyongyang, July 16 (KCNA) -- July and August are the months of maritime physical culture in the DPRK.
					 In the early 1960s, President Kim Il Sung took a measure of setting July and August as months for learning swimming. According to this measure, swimming contests took place at the Hungnam Fertilizer Factory with the attendance of sports teams from across the country. And the maritime sports contest was held in Pyongyang on the occasion of the 17th anniversary of the Korean people's victory in the Fatherland Liberation War, followed by a maritime gymnastic display "Sea Calls Young People" in Sinpho in August Juche 51 (1962).
					
					 The DPRK has steadily laid solid foundations for ensuring maritime physical culture with swimming pools and water parks built throughout the country.
					
					 With the start of this year's swimming season, every beach and swimming places including Majon and Songdowon beaches and Munsu Water Park are crowded with visitors. 
					
					 In particular, swimming is regarded as one of compulsory courses at schools of different levels.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Intensified Struggle against Imperialists' Ideological and Cultural Poisoning
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Intensified Struggle against Imperialists' Ideological and Cultural Poisoning
						
 Pyongyang, July 16 (KCNA) -- The revolutionary people should not make even a single step back in the struggle against the imperialists' ideological and cultural poisoning, says Rodong Sinmun Wednesday in an article.
					 The imperialists have become evermore frantic in their reactionary ideological offensive to keep capitalism from falling into the abyss of ruin and dampen the growing desire of humankind for socialism, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					 A single concession on the ideological front would lead to two and three concessions and it would become impossible to defend socialism in the end.
					
					 The struggle for foiling the imperialists' crafty and persistent bourgeois ideological and cultural poisoning is a war without gun-report.
					
					 In recent years the U.S.-led imperialist forces toppled governments in some countries through ideological and cultural poisoning and psychological warfare and built pro-U.S. regimes. The imperialists loudly advertise them as "bloodless revolution" and "color revolution".
					
					 This proves that the imperialists are shouting "bravo" over the fact that the reactionary ideological and cultural poisoning helps them achieve their aggression aims hard to attain through military provocations. This, at the same time, indicates what enormous efforts they are directing to their operations for ideological and cultural poisoning.
					
					 The reality teaches a serious lesson that what is essential in the confrontation between socialism and capitalism is confrontation of ideology and that it is, therefore, imperative to consolidate the ideological position in every way without allowing even a single concession.
					
					 The article calls on the countries aspiring after independence and socialism and their peoples to be clearly aware of the danger of the imperialists' ideological and cultural poisoning and intensify the struggle against it.

articles.title: South Korean Authorities Urged to Do away with Anachronistic Conception of Hostility
articles.content:
South Korean Authorities Urged to Do away with Anachronistic Conception of Hostility 
 Pyongyang, July 16 (KCNA) -- It is a prerequisite for achieving the reconciliation and unity between the north and the south to put an end to the inter-Korean confrontation, says Rodong Sinmun Wednesday in an article.
					 The root cause of the inter-Korean confrontation lies in the U.S. ambition for dominating the whole of Korea, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					 It is the requirement of the times and, at the same time, the will of all Koreans to bring about an epochal phase of independent reunification, peace and prosperity by putting an end to the history of antagonism and distrust and achieving reconciliation and unity through cooperation between fellow countrymen, not cooperation with outsiders.
					
					 The DPRK in its government statement advanced a just proposal for bringing about a new phase of reconciliation and unity by resolving the issues concerning the north-south relations as required by the times and desire of the compatriots.
					
					 It has become a trend of the times for the nations and countries of the world with differing ideologies and social systems to cooperate and co-exist for development and prosperity.
					
					 The south Korean authorities should boldly do away with the conception dating back to the Cold War era when countries antagonized each other because of their differing ideologies and social systems.
					
					 What should be done before anything else is to halt the joint military exercises with foreign forces, the most vivid manifestation of the hostile policy towards the fellow countrymen.
					
					 Absolutely intolerable are the joint military exercises with outside forces as they throw a stumbling block in mending the inter-Korean relations at a time when the fellow countrymen should pool their efforts and wisdom.
					
					 It is quite possible to achieve detente between the north and the south and improve the relations between them when the Koreans implement the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration, great programmes for reunification common to the nation in the new century.
					
					 Now is the time for the south Korean authorities to make a bold decision in order not to commit any more disgraceful evils to be censured by history and the generations to come.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities Urged Not to Bedevil Inter-Korean Relations
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities Urged Not to Bedevil Inter-Korean Relations
						
 Pyongyang, July 16 (KCNA) -- Minjok Thongsin, an internet paper of Koreans in the U.S., in an article on July 11 urged the south Korean authorities to sincerely respond to the statement of the DPRK government.
					 This year the north has made steady efforts to mend the inter-Korean relations through a series of proposals for reunification, the article said, adding:
					
					 The U.S. and the south Korean authorities are going ahead with the joint military exercises aimed at invading the north with nukes against this backdrop, arousing serious concern among the compatriots at home and abroad. Moreover, the U.S. introduced nuclear carrier George Washington and Aegis destroyer Kidd to south Korea, escalating the military tension on the Korean peninsula. Worse still, it is hurling Japanese armed forces into the so-called south Korea-U.S-Japan joint military exercises.
					
					 While asserting its policy of attaching importance to the nation, the north has demanded the south Korean authorities discard the attitude of creating tensions by introducing foreign forces into the peninsula.
					
					 Nevertheless, the south Korean authorities have refused to meet the principled requirements of the north while depending on foreign forces. On the contrary, they are pulling up the north over its nuclear weapons, while talking about its "sincerity" and "confidence".
					
					 As far as the "nuclear issue of the north" is concerned, it was spawned by the U.S. nuclear threat.
					
					 The south Korean authorities should not strain the inter-Korean relations any longer but make positive efforts for peace and take a sincere attitude toward the proposal of the north.
					
					 Koreans at home and abroad will advance, holding high the banner of the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration in the spirit of By Our Nation Itself.

articles.title: Ferry Sewol Highly Likely to Collide with Submarine: S. Korean Paper
articles.content:
Ferry Sewol Highly Likely to Collide with Submarine: S. Korean Paper
						
 Pyongyang, July 16 (KCNA) -- An article titled "Collision between Sewol and submarine or unidentified radar image" was posted on the south Korean internet newspaper Jaju Minbo.
					 A media released a report on the basis of an analysis of a radar image obtained at the time of the Sewol sinking. It made it clear that the moment the ferry was rapidly veering, there was a clear image showing a strange structure about 100 meters in length and about 10 meters in width approaching from behind all of a sudden.
					
					 It continued:
					
					 If anything made its appearance near the ferry Sewol as soon as it sank in the waters where there was nothing else, obviously it might be a structure that surfaced from the sea.
					
					 Some asserted that they were containers that fell down from the ferry, but it was clarified that no containers were detected by radar when the scene of containers floating in the sea was photographed from a helicopter.
					
					 What's more clear was that the containers on the deck on the bow side of the ferry did not fell down the moment it began to tilt but they did so when it further inclined sideways before it remained 52 degrees sidewise. This was confirmed by the video taken from a helicopter at that time.
					
					 All facts prove that there was no likelihood that the structure was containers.
					
					 The position where the structure surfaced suggests that it collided with the bottom on the left side of the ferry and there was likelihood that the structure surfaced and observed the scene right after the ferry's sinking before submerging again and taking to flight or sank due to the strong shock caused by collision.
					
					 It was also highly likely that the ferry sank due to the wrong operation of a balance pump or a screw when the ferry suddenly veered to dodge the submarine.
					
					 The recently disclosed radar image showed a suspicious thing with the printed figures T13068 before the track of the rescue ship of maritime police and a thing with letter M at around 6:50, 7:13 and 7:24.
					
					 M is in wide use notably on military hardware.
					
					 In the final analysis, the radar image shows that there is high possibility that Sewol collided with a submarine that was involved in a military drill.
					
					 The article called for conducting a prompt investigation into this matter and clarifying what that huge structure was.

articles.title: Hunger Strike Launched for Probe into Truth about Ferry Sewol Disaster in S. Korea
articles.content:
Hunger Strike Launched for Probe into Truth about Ferry Sewol Disaster in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, July 16 (KCNA) -- The Measure Committee of the Families of Victims, Missing Persons and Survivors of the Ferry Sewol Sinking Accident of south Korea launched a hunger strike on July 14 demanding the institution of a special law for the probe into the truth about the disaster.
					 Before launching the strike, the organization held a press conference outside the "National Assembly" building in Seoul.
					
					 At the press conference the organization asserted that it is impossible to probe the truth about the Sewol disaster with the existing mechanism as it was an unprecedented tragedy.
					
					 The special law the organization proposed with the signature of millions of people calls for probing the truth about the accident and building a safe society but it has not yet been brought up for discussion, the organization deplored.
					
					 It stressed that it wants to have the special law instituted even by launching the hunger strike because the "government" is not claiming responsibility for the disaster and the NA is not doing its best.
					
					 The organization called on the people of all social standings to pool efforts for the institution of the special law.

articles.title: Release of Those Related to Attempted Rebellion Case Demanded in S. Korea
articles.content:
Release of Those Related to Attempted Rebellion Case Demanded in S. Korea 
						
 Pyongyang, July 16 (KCNA) -- Members of the Family Movement for Realizing Democracy, the Association for Supporting Prisoners of Conscience of the Family Movement for Realizing Democracy, the Measure Committee to Denounce the Intelligence Service's Fabrication of Plotted Rebellion and Suppression under the Pretext of Security and other civic and public organizations and over 2 000 citizens of south Korea held a rally on July 12 in demand of the release of those who were unreasonably detained.
					 The speakers said the attempted rebellion case was something unimaginable as it was a sheer fabrication.
					
					 Those who were detained on charges of involvement in the case fought for the reconciliation and reunification of the south and the north, they held, adding that all of them are not guilty.
					
					 If the authorities should detain people for the mere reason that they have thoughts different from them, they should detain even children, the speakers jeered.
					
					 They vowed to carry on actions until the detainees are set free.

articles.title: Guarantee of Right of Part-Time Workers Demanded in S. Korea
articles.content:
Guarantee of Right of Part-Time Workers Demanded in S. Korea
						
 Pyongyang, July 16 (KCNA) -- Part-time workers of factories under the Hyundai Iron Works in Tangjin, South Chungchong Province and in Sunchon, South Jolla Province launched a joint strike in demand of the guarantee of their rights, according to Chamsesang, an internet newspaper of south Korea.
					 The part-time job chapter of Hyundai Iron Works of the South Chungchong Provincial Branch and the part-time job chapter of Hyundai Iron Works of the Kwangju-South Jolla Provincial Branch of Metal Workers' Trade Union held a ceremony of kicking off a joint strike in Seoul on July 10.
					
					 Speakers at the ceremony accused the enterprise management side of reneging on the promise it made with the part-time workers, declaring they would not take part in the business activities that impose sacrifices on the subcontracted workers only.
					
					 More than 10 workers have lost their lives since last year but the management side has not owned any responsibility for them, the speakers deplored.
					
					 They called for the restructuring of the harsh labor system whereby no holiday is allowed if other colleagues do not work to substitute those on off day.
					
					 They vowed to fight it out until subcontracted workers and part-time workers may safely work in their work sites free from the danger of death.

articles.title: Letter to Kim Jong Un from Members of Delegation of General Association of Koreans in China
articles.content:
Letter to Kim Jong Un from Members of Delegation of General Association of Koreans in China
 Pyongyang, July 16 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un was presented with a letter by the members of the delegation of the General Association of Koreans in China headed by Chairwoman Choe Un Bok on Tuesday before leaving the homeland.
					 They said in the letter that they recollected again with deep emotion all sorts of hardships President Kim Il Sung suffered for more than 70 years and his great immortal exploits by participating in various memorial events held on the occasion of the 20th anniversary of his demise and deeply enshrined them in their hearts.
					
					 Highly praising the exploits performed by the President in his lifetime, they stressed that history records many famous persons and leaders who claimed to have worked for people, but there is no such a great leader of the people, distinguished teacher of global progressive mankind and defender of justice and truth who devoted himself to the freedom and happiness of the people, national reunification and final victory of the cause of independence against imperialism till the last moments of his life as Kim Il Sung.
					
					 They recalled that very busy as he was with state affairs, Kim Jong Un remembered overseas Koreans who miss the President very much, invited them to attend the memorial event commemorating the 20th anniversary of demise of the President and take its platform, made sure that they put up at the de luxe guesthouse and hotel and took such measures as sending officials to take warm care of them so that they might not feel any slightest inconvenience.
					
					 The letter expressed their resolution to devote all their efforts to the patriotic work for realizing the desire of the President and leader Kim Jong Il for building a thriving nation, always remaining true to the noble intention of Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Congress of Korean Sportsmen's Federation in Japan Held
articles.content:
Congress of Korean Sportsmen's Federation in Japan Held
						
 Pyongyang, July 16 (KCNA) -- The 22nd Congress of the Korean Sportsmen's Federation in Japan took place in Tokyo on July 12.
					 Attending it were Pae Ik Ju, vice-chairman of the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon), Kim Sang Il, its permanent member, Kim Ro Hyon, chairman of the federation, and other deputies.
					
					 Read out at the congress was a congratulatory message sent by Marshal Kim Jong Un to the 23rd Congress of Chongryon. 
					
					 Ri Chong Gyong, director general of the Standing Council of the federation, made a report.
					
					 He said that the federation actively conducted the work to contribute to the building of a sports power of the homeland and the work for the country's reunification and external activities, thus registering great achievements.
					
					 He said that the federation would make tangible contributions to building sports power of the homeland and realizing the cause of Korea's reunification and conduct brisk external activities.
					
					 A congratulatory message from the Ministry of Physical Culture and Sports of the DPRK on the occasion of the 60th anniversary of the formation of the federation was read out to be followed by speeches.
					
					 Pae Ik Ju in a speech said that the federation and sportspersons should make sincere contributions to opening up a new heyday of Chongryon through sports activities as they received the loving care and benevolence of the peerless great men of Mt. Paektu.
					
					 Kim Ro Hyon was reelected chairman of the federation.
					
					 A letter to Kim Jong Un was read out.
					
					 After the congress there was an enlarged meeting of the first session of the 22nd Standing Council of the federation.

articles.title: Events for Remembering Kim Il Sung Held in China
articles.content:
Events for Remembering Kim Il Sung Held in China
 Pyongyang, July 16 (KCNA) -- A Korean book, photo and handicraft exhibition, photo exhibition and film shows were held in China from July 5 to 12 on the occasion of the 20th anniversary of demise of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Displayed at the venues of the events were photos documenting exploits of Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Also on display there were works of the peerless great men of Mt. Paektu, photos and books introducing Songun Korea and handicrafts associated with creative skills of Koreans.
					
					 Films shown included "Eternal treasures in praise of sun".
					
					 The chairman of the China World Peace Foundation and other personages said that Kim Il Sung was the great leader of the Korean people who worked heart and soul for the victory of the Korean revolution. "Looking up to his image, we could realize the reverence of the world progressives for him," he added.
					
					 The chairman of a literary and art organization in Tangshan City, Hebei Province, China and other speakers noted that the exhibition provided an opportunity to know better about the immortal exploits Kim Il Sung performed for the Korean revolution and the development of the friendly relations between China and the DPRK.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung Remembered in Different Countries
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung Remembered in Different Countries
 Pyongyang, July 16 (KCNA) -- Meetings for remembering President Kim Il Sung took place in Russia, Vietnam and Brazil on July 4 and 7 on the occasion of the 20th anniversary of his demise.
					 Present there were personages of the Maritime Territorial Committee of the Communist Party of the Russian Federation, Vietnam-DPRK Friendship Association, Vietnam-DPRK Friendship Kindergarten, Brazilian Communist Party, Party for Free Motherland of Brazil, Brazilian Center for the Study of the Juche Idea and the Jose Marti Hall of Brazil and masses.
					
					 The first secretary of the Maritime Territorial Committee of the Communist Party of the Russian Federation, said:
					
					 Comrade Kim Il Sung was the greatest man.
					
					 The Juche idea founded by him fully reflected the requirements of the present times.
					
					 The reality today clearly proves that if a country neither depends on its efforts nor possesses armed forces powerful enough to defend itself, it will be reduced to a bargaining chip for big powers.
					
					 As it is led by Marshal Kim Jong Un, the DPRK will make steady progress along the road explored and advanced by Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The vice-chairman of the Vietnam-DPRK Friendship Association said:
					
					 Kim Il Sung, the great leader of the Korean people, was a close friend of the Vietnamese people.
					
					 We extend thanks to him for rendering material and moral assistance to the Vietnamese people in their struggle for national liberation and socialist construction.
					
					 We will as ever make positive efforts for the development of the friendly relations with the DPRK.
					
					 The secretary general of the Brazilian Center for the Study of the Juche Idea and other speakers praised the President for performing undying feats for the human cause of independence.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung Remembered by Brazilian, Nigerian Organizations
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung Remembered by Brazilian, Nigerian Organizations
						
 Pyongyang, July 16 (KCNA) -- Brazilian and Nigerian organizations posted special write-ups and articles on their websites on the occasion of the 20th anniversary of demise of President Kim Il Sung.
					 The Brazilian Committee for Remembering Leader Kim Jong Il posted a special article titled "President Kim Il Sung is the father of socialist Korea" illustrated with the portrait of the smiling President on July 3.
					
					 The article said that the President founded the Juche idea and the Songun idea and victoriously advanced the revolution and construction under its banner.
					
					 It is quite natural to convey the feats performed by the President in the nation-building and praise him as the father of socialist Korea, the article stressed.
					
					 The Brazilian Committee for Solidarity with the DPRK posted an article titled "President Kim Il Sung, elder statesman recognized by the world" illustrated with his photo on July 8.
					
					 Praising the President as the elder statesman recognized by the world as he glorified the 20th century, the article introduced energetic external activities he conducted till the last moments of his life and the orders, medals, honorary titles and gifts he received from many countries and international bodies.
					
					 The Nigerian National Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism on July 5 edited the article titled "In memory of great man."
					
					 It said:
					
					 Kim Il Sung demonstrated before the whole world the truth and vitality of the Juche idea and the Songun idea during his revolutionary leadership for decades, making the idea serve as the guiding idea of popular masses' cause of independence and noble mental treasure common to humankind.
					
					 He was, indeed, the most distinguished leader representing the 20th century, peerless great man and great sage of humankind.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung Praised by Syrian Political Party Leader
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung Praised by Syrian Political Party Leader
 Pyongyang, July 16 (KCNA) -- Adnan Ismail, general secretary of the Socialist Unionist Party of Syria, made public a statement on July 8, the 20th anniversary of demise of President Kim Il Sung.
					 The statement said:
					
					 Kim Il Sung was the father of socialist Korea and the most distinguished leader of the people as he dedicated all his life to the country and its people, times and humankind.
					
					 He is always alive in the hearts of the close Korean people and progressive mankind.
					
					 World progressives will never forget Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il, the greatest heroes who won victory in the struggle against colonialism and imperialist forces, but praise them through generations.
					
					 Marshal Kim Jong Un steering the Korean people is creditably carrying forward the ideas and exploits of the President and Kim Jong Il without an inch of deflection.
					
					 Under the guidance of Kim Jong Un the Korean people will surely accomplish the socialist cause.
					
					 We fully support the Korean people in their struggle for the reunification and prosperity of the country.

articles.title: Korean Photo, Book and Handicraft Exhibitions Open in Peru, Brazil
articles.content:
Korean Photo, Book and Handicraft Exhibitions Open in Peru, Brazil
						
 Pyongyang, July 16 (KCNA) -- Korean photo, book and handicraft exhibitions were open in Peru and Brazil on July 7 on the occasion of the 20th anniversary of demise of President Kim Il Sung.
					 On display at the venues of the exhibitions were photos dealing with the personalities of the President, leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un as great men and their exploits.
					
					 Displayed there were works of the peerless great men of Mt. Paektu, photos and books introducing Songun Korea and handicrafts associated with the wisdom and skills of Koreans.
					
					 Ruth Anchorena, general secretary of the Peruvian People's Women Union, hoped that the exhibition would offer the Peruvian people an opportunity to know better about the Korean people and the DPRK achieving progress and prosperity, holding the great leaders in high esteem generation after generation.
					
					 The chairman of the Peruvian Committee for Remembering Generalissimo Kim Jong Il said that the President was the founder of the immortal Juche idea and eternal leader of the cause of global independence, adding that the committee would deeply study works of the peerless great men of Mt. Paektu and widely introduce their greatness and immortal exploits to the Peruvian people.
					
					 Gabriel Goncalves Martinez, chairman of the Brazilian Center for the Study of the Juche Idea, and other figures stressed that the President was the iron-willed brilliant commander who embarked on the road of revolution in his early years and defeated the formidable U.S. and Japanese imperialist enemies and the father of the Korean nation who dedicated himself to the country's prosperity and people's happiness all his life and he would always be alive in the hearts of not only the Korean people but the world progressives.

articles.title: Foreign Media Observe Anniversary of Kim Il Sung's Demise
articles.content:
Foreign Media Observe Anniversary of Kim Il Sung's Demise
						
 Pyongyang, July 16 (KCNA) -- Foreign media carried special write-ups on the occasion of the 20th anniversary of demise of President Kim Il Sung.
					 The Russian paper Nizhegorodskaya Pravda on July 3 devoted one whole page to an article under the title "Kim Il Sung believed in people as in Heaven" and subtitle "Why not only Korea but other countries still remember him?" illustrated with photos documenting his exploits.
					
					 The paper introduced in detail the facts that he met heads of state and figures of different circles of many countries in his lifetime and the foreigners who had the honor of being received by him expressed profound reverence for him.
					
					 The July issue of International Link, a magazine of Hong Kong, China, carried a special write-up accompanied with photos of Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 In an article titled "Eternal sun" the magazine said that the august name of Kim Il Sung means the sun, he will be immortal just as the sun is eternal and his idea and cause will shine forever.
					
					 The magazine in an article titled "Songun brilliant commander and socialist Korea" referred to the pluck and grit of Kim Jong Un, another Songun brilliant commander, and his wise leadership with which he has demonstrated the dignity and might of the DPRK before the whole world.
					
					 The July issue of the German paper Rote Fahne carried an article titled "In memory of Comrade Kim Il Sung" illustrated with a portrait of the smiling President while the July-August issue of a British paper an article captioned "On the occasion of the 20th anniversary of demise of Comrade Kim Il Sung" illustrated with his photo.

articles.title: Nigerian Organization Observes Anniversary of Birth of Kim Hyong Jik
articles.content:
Nigerian Organization Observes Anniversary of Birth of Kim Hyong Jik
						
 Pyongyang, July 16 (KCNA) -- The Nigerian National Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism posted an article titled "Jiwon" on its website on July 5 on the occasion of the 120th birth anniversary of indomitable revolutionary fighter Kim Hyong Jik.
					 The article said:
					
					 The word Jiwon means that one must aim high.
					
					 It reflects the profound idea that one should achieve the independence of the country at any cost by struggling generation after generation and build a new society in which the people are masters.
					
					 It was Kim Hyong Jik who propounded this idea.
					
					 He was an outstanding leader of the anti-Japanese national liberation movement in Korea.
					
					 He built schools wherever he went for the distant future of the country and devoted himself to the great work for training children to be successors to the revolution.
					
					 He paid special attention to the education of his children, making sure that the sacred struggle for the liberation of the country was given steady continuity.
					
					 Kim Hyong Jik's strong desire for the liberation of the country was successfully realized by President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 The President fathered the Juche idea and the Songun idea, guided by the noble idea of Jiwon, indicating the path of the Korean revolution and accomplishing the historic cause of the liberation of the country through the 20 year-long arduous anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle. 
					
					 The DPRK is now making a leap forward to build a highly civilized socialist nation under the leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Kim Hyong Jik's idea of Jiwon will shine forever.

articles.title: Mas de 6 millones de personas visitan lugar historico-revolucionario de Kosanjin
articles.content:
Mas de 6 millones de personas visitan lugar historico-revolucionario de Kosanjin 
Manpho, 16 de julio (ACNC) -- Con motivo del dia del triunfo en la guerra numerosas personas visitan cada dia el lugar de interes historico-revolucionario de Kosanjin situado en la ciudad de Manpho de la provincia de Jagang.
					Durante mas de 50 anos despues de construirlo el 47 (1958) de la Era Juche, lo visitaron mas de 6 millones de oficiales y soldados del Ejercito Popular de Corea, trabajadores de distintos estratos, jovenes y ninos escolares.
					
					Permaneciendo en ese lugar desde principio de noviembre hasta mediados de diciembre de 1950, el Generalisimo Kim Il Sung ideo la  victoria final de la Guerra de Liberacion de la Patria, organizo y dirigio sabiamente nueva operacion de contraataque para preparar la fase trascendental en la guerra.
					
					Alli hay el puesto de mando de la Comandancia Suprema en Rimsonggol, el manantial, el lugar de trilla, el puesto de ametralladora antiaerea de Sungribong, el campo de tiro, el puesto de mando de la Comandancia Suprema de Somungori, la direccion de operacion de la Comandancia Suprema, el lugar de batalla antiaerea, etc.
					
					Ademas estan varios objetos de los lugares de interes historico-revolucionario de Kujolgol y Oryugol y Pyolo.
					
					Los visitantes volvieron a asimilar la perspicacia, la audacia y la abnegacion infatigable del Presidente por la victoria de guerra.

articles.title: Metodo de la administracion combinada de agro-selvicultura
articles.content:
Metodo de la administracion combinada de agro-selvicultura
						
Pyongyang, 16 de julio (ACNC) -- En estos dias, en el sector forestal de Corea se logran beneficios en la creacion de bosque y la produccion de productos agricolas introduciendo el metodo de la administracion combinada de la agro-selvicultura.
					El distrito Songchon de la provincia de Phyong-an del Sur aplico este metodo en el bosque cuya superficie fue aumentada en mas de 100 hectareas en comparacion con el ano  pasado.
					
					En el ano pasado, el distrito planto y cultivo en cientos de hectareas nogal, lena atada, castano, maiz, soya, boniato, mani y otros arboles y productos agricolas.
					
					Por tanto, elevo mas de 98 por ciento la proporcion de radicacion de arbol y mas de 1.7 veces la velocidad de crecimiento en comparacion con el ano pasado y cosecho los productos agricolas de cientos de toneladas.
					
					El distrito Kujang de la provincia de Phyong-an del Norte garantizo ciento por ciento la proporcion de radicacion de arbol introduciendo el metodo arriba mencionado.
					
					El distrito que planto el ano pasado en los bosques mas de 126 mil arboles de gran valor economico hizo elevar la fertilidad de la tierra haciendo la administracion combinada de varios cultivos.
					
					Los profesores e investigadores del Instituto Superior de Agricultura y Silvicultura de Kanggye crearon el herbazal para alimentos de ganado realizando durante 7-8 anos la investigacion de creacion del herbazal con el metodo de administracion combinada de la agro-selvicultura.
					
					La proporcion de radicacion de forraje es de 100% y su cantidad de produccion es mas de 2 veces en comparacion con el ano pasado.

articles.title: Buscados en RPDC nuevos recursos naturales de terapia
articles.content:
Buscados en RPDC nuevos recursos naturales de terapia
						
Pyongyang, 16 de julio (ACNC) -- En el reciente recorrido por todo el pais, los investigadores de la Agencia de Informacion de la Ciencia Medica de la Academia de Ciencias Medicas de Corea descubrieron mas de 190 fuentes termales, aguas minerales, sitios de limoterapia y aguas del monte.
					Comenzando por el analisis del manantial de la casa natal del Presidente Kim Il Sung en Mangyongdae y la colina Mangyong de esta capital, realizaron la toma de muestras y el analisis de la composicion de dichos recursos recorriendo mas de 30 mil ries (10 ries equivalen a 4 kilometros).
					
					Durante esos dias, reafirmaron el caracter fisico-quimico y las propiedades de los recursos ya buscados y descubrieron nuevamente 47 fuentes de aguas minerales, un punto de limoterapia y 146 sitios con aguas del monte para la terapia.
					
					Entre 20 fuentes termales y 27 de aguas minerales figuran la fuente termal de Sin-on del distrito de Taegwan, el agua mineral del monte Taesong del municipio de Taesong, el de Taljon de la ciudad de Tanchon, etc.
					
					El lodazal de Jingangpho en el distrito de Kwail contiene en abundancia los minerales imprescindibles en la curacion de diversas enfermedades.
					
					Entre 146 puntos con aguas del monte figuran el manantial de Taedok de la ciudad de Hoeryong, el de Sondae del distrito de Hoeyang, el de Chosan del distrito de igual nombre, etc.
					
					En particular, el manantial de Poso del distrito de Samjiyon se recomienda en la profilaxis de apoplejia cerebral, hipertension, arteriosclerosis, etc.
					
					Los investigadores y los medicos redactaron el libro "Guia general de recursos naturales curativos de Corea" (de 5 tomos) que presenta los recursos recien desarrollados.
					
					El Mariscal Kim Jong Un aprecio mucho a los autores del libro.

articles.title: Ciclo de deportes maritimos en RPDC
articles.content:
Ciclo de deportes maritimos en RPDC
						
Pyongyang, 16 de julio (ACNC) -- Julio y agosto son el ciclo de deportes maritimos en la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea que esta rodeada del mar en sus tres lados y tiene muchos rios y lagos.
					El Presidente Kim Il Sung definio a principios de la decada de 1960 el ciclo de natacion julio-agosto.
					
					En aquel entonces, tuvieron lugar en la piscina de la Fabrica de Abono de Hungnam (de aquel tiempo) la competencia de natacion de los jugadores de conjuntos deportivos y el torneo de deportes maritimos en Pyongyang en homenaje al 17o aniversario de la liberacion de Corea.
					
					En agosto del 51 (1962) de la Era Juche, se efectuo en Sinpho la gimnasia masiva maritima "El mar llama a los jovenes".
					
					De ahi para aca se ha establecido el clima social de practicar deportes nauticos en julio y agosto de cada ano.
					
					En estos dias de calor sofocante, estan llamando a los veraneantes las playas y las piscinas, acondicionadas por doquier del pais como la playa de Majon, la de Songdowon y el Complejo de Piscinas de Recreacion de Munsu.
					
					Todos los sectores y unidades organizan las actividades asociadas con deportes de ese tipo.
					
					En particular, los organos docentes fomentan la natacion entre el alumnado.
					
					A traves de la clase de natacion y actividades extraescolares, los profesores ensenan a los alumnos los movimientos basicos y habilidades de nado organizando frecuentemente la competencia.
